metadata.title: Teams Advanced Administration
metadata.subtitle: Master Microsoft Teams Enterprise Management
metadata.description: Become an expert in Microsoft Teams administration, mastering advanced governance, security, compliance, and enterprise deployment features for large organizations.
prerequisites: Knowledge of networking and telephony concepts

overview.summary: Teams Advanced Administration training equips you with expert-level skills for managing Microsoft Teams in large enterprise environments, including advanced governance, security, compliance, and telephony features.
overview.targetAudience: Teams administrators, IT professionals, and collaboration specialists who manage Microsoft Teams in enterprise organizations.

modules.title: Advanced Teams Governance
modules.description: Master advanced governance and lifecycle management

sections.content:
Enterprise Governance

Advanced governance ensures Teams environments remain organized, secure, and compliant with organizational policies and regulatory requirements.

sections.title: Governance Features
items: Team creation policies and approval workflows

modules.title: Teams Security and Compliance
modules.description: Implement comprehensive security and compliance features

sections.content:
Security and Compliance

Teams integrates with Microsoft 365 security and compliance features to protect sensitive information and ensure regulatory compliance.

labs.title: Security Lab
labs.description: Implement Teams security and compliance features

modules.title: Advanced Telephony and Meetings
modules.description: Master advanced telephony and meeting features

sections.content: Advanced telephony and meeting features enable enterprise-grade communication capabilities with comprehensive management and security controls.

labs.title: Telephony Lab
labs.description: Configure advanced Teams telephony and meetings

sections.content:
Performance and Monitoring

Effective monitoring and optimization ensure Teams performs optimally and provides valuable insights into usage and adoption.

includes: Hands-on lab access with Teams tenant

instructor.name: David Chen
instructor.title: Principal Collaboration Architect
instructor.bio: David is a Principal Collaboration Architect specializing in Microsoft Teams and Microsoft 365 collaboration solutions. He has designed and implemented Teams solutions for large enterprises and has extensive experience in governance and security.
certifications: Microsoft Certified: Microsoft 365 Enterprise Administrator Expert
Microsoft Certified: Modern Desktop Administrator Associate

certification.name: Teams Advanced Administration Certification
certification.description: Demonstrate expertise in advanced Microsoft Teams administration, governance, security, and enterprise deployment

faq.question: Do I need Teams Phone licensing?
faq.answer: While Teams Phone licensing is beneficial for telephony labs, the course covers both licensed and unlicensed scenarios. We provide demo environments for hands-on practice.

faq.question: Is this course technical?
faq.answer: Yes, this is a technical course covering advanced Teams administration. Basic Teams knowledge and PowerShell experience are recommended.

faq.question: What governance features are covered?
faq.answer: The course covers information barriers, team creation policies, guest access management, compliance recording, and advanced lifecycle management.

faq.question: Will I learn about Teams security?
faq.answer: Yes, security is a major component including DLP policies, conditional access, audit logging, and integration with Microsoft 365 security features.
